TEXT: A primordial shaman from the Foglands. NL Deceives and demolishes her foes with traps and ritual magic.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~sister,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

~[#45818e]CONSCIOUSNESS.[]~ NL NL You are awake again, to the dull sting and #p@droning@ #p@incantations@ of your tribe's healers mending your wounds. NL NL You recall it now. Traps evaded, curses neutralized; your #g~charge~ has outwitted you, a fugitive on the lam. You have failed in your sacred duty, to let #r@no@ #r@soul@ #r@escape@ this place of exile. But that is the last thing on your mind... NL NL ...Where is she running to?
